activities: Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland: CareSpeak Communications offers patient medical therapy management services to the healthcare industry. In doing so CareSpeak Communications collects and uses the mobile phone number and/or email information from the patients and/or their caregivers. In providing these services CareSpeak Communications may be required to collect additional personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Drugs & Pharmaceuticals - (DRG)Health Care Services - (HCS)Telecommunications Services - (TES)Computer Software - (CSF)
personaldata: Mobile phone number, name, medications, birth date, postal code, sex, biometric data measured (e.g. pulse, blood sugar), caregiver name and number, etc.. No manually processed data.
